g.text: You are controling a tank. You need to kill the people.
You need to pick up as many medical kits as you can.
Use W to jump, A to move left, D to move right, and space bar to shoot.
Press C to enter cheat mode, V to exit cheat mode (if in cheat mode).
Collect medical kits and go to exit quickly.
You can earn double points in the zoom mode.
